name: Cavalier's Banner
summary: You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits.
description:
You fly the banner of your pledge from your mount, raising your allies' spirits. You and all allies within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Will saves and DCs against fear effects. If your banner is destroyed or removed, allies within 30 feet become frightened 1.Cavalier's Banner Leads To...

Stalwart Standard, Wave the FlagTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.

Emotion: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.Mental: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.Uncommon: Something of uncommon rarity requires special training or comes from a particular culture or part of the world. Some character choices give access to uncommon options, and the GM can choose to allow access for anyone. Less is known about uncommon creatures than common creatures. They typically can't be summoned. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to these creature is increased by 2.Visual: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.
